name: Paralyzed (itch) (Xclad)
description:
This Game needs to be Played in full Screen

In This Game You'll have to move forward by shooting at your Player with the help of turret. The only movement your player can do is Jumping. You'll have Spirits to guide you so are not alone in this game .

How To Play:-

Control Turret Using Mouse.

Shoot Using Left Mouse Button.

Jump Using Right Mouse Button(longer you press the button higher you'll Jump)

This game was made in a week for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2

Theme: You're Not Alone!

 Art is  made by our team  during the jam.
